resume.title: FAIZOLLA AMANBEK
resume.description:
FAIZOLLA AMANBEK
+77073267850 •rahugg07@gmail.com •linkedin.com/in/amanbek-faizolla •github.com/Rahugg
ОБРАЗОВАНИЕ
Казахстанско-Британский Технический Университет Выпуск 2021 - 2025
B.S. Вычислительная Техника и Программное Обеспечение 3.7/4.00 GPA
Дисциплины: Алгоритмы и Структуры Данных, ООП, Разработка высоко нагруженных систем, Дискретная Математика,
Высшая Математика, Линейная Алгебра
ТЕХНИЧЕСКИЕ НАВЫКИ
Языки Программирования: JavaScript, Golang, Python, C++, Java
Фреймворки и Базы Данных: PostgreSQL, Redis, React, Angular, Gin, Django
Технологии: Git, Linux, Docker, gRPC, Swagger, Kafka, Prometheus, Grafana, Rest API
ОПЫТ РАБОТЫ
Backend Developer at Feedback, Almaty, KZ Авг 2023 – Настоящее время
•Самостоятельно изучил Golang и реализовал сложные функции, преодолевая проблемы интеграции многофункци-
ональных систем.
•Разработал микросервис для оценки событий в реальном времени с помощью QR-кода, интегрировал веб-
сокеты , используя паттерны конкурентного программирования на языке Golang , что значительно увеличило ско-
рость и отзывчивость микросервиса в 3 раза .
•Подключил Redis для кэширования данных , существенно ускорив время отклика приложения , улучшив общую
производительность.
•Сократил количество ошибок в коде за счет рефакторинга существующей кодовой базы, добавил документацию
для сервисов с помощью Swagger.
Fullstack Developer at Ligeia.AI, Almaty, KZ Янв 2023 – Июн 2023
•Разработал сайт в команде из 5 человек для конкретного предприятия с использованием Django ,PostgreSQL и
React добившись активности в 1000+ пользователей.
•Создал виджет областной диаграммы в реальном времени на React, улучшив визуализацию и понимание данных
для команды.
•Автоматизировал извлечение данных, увеличив скорость на 20% с помощью Python и pandas для конвертации в
CSV.
ОБУЧЕНИЕ
Nfactorial Incubator 2022, Almaty, KZ Июн 2022 – Авг 2022
•Среди4 000 претендентов, получил место среди 150 отобранных участников 10-недельного международного
Bootcamp
•Решил алгоритмические задачи, развил Soft skills ,создал full-stack приложение со стеком MERN
•Исправил ошибки в приложении, используя полученные знания о Linux, Git и клиент-серверной архитектуры , а
также создал full-stack на базе React для поиска аниме-цитат.
ПРОЕКТЫ
CRM-system Сен 2023 - Дек 2023
Ссылка на проект
•Спроектировал и реализовал с нуля микросервисную архитектуру для приложения, используя широкий стек
технологий: Golang, PostgreSQL, gRPC, Docker, Grafana, Prometheus, Kafka и Redis
•Внедрил Rest API для общения с клиентом и gRPC для межсервисной коммуникации, обеспечивая эффективное
взаимодействие компонентов системы.
•Интегрировал Docker и Docker-compose для контейнеризации приложения , что повысило скорость запуска в 5
раз, оптимизируя процесс развертывания.
•Подключил метрики для отслеживания нагрузки и добавил профилирование и управление событиями на основе
Kafka , обеспечивая надежность и производительность системы.

resume.title: Alikhan Mazhiken
resume.description:
Alikhan Mazhiken
+7 (708) 352-90-26 |mazhiken.alikhan@gmail.com |linkedin.com/in/mazhiken |github.com/mazhikenalikhan
Education
Kazakh-British Technical University Almaty, Kazakhstan
Master of Software Engineering Sep. 2023 – June 2025
Astana IT University Astana, Kazakhstan
Bachelor of Computer Science Sep. 2019 – June 2022
Experience
Java Developer Sep. 2022 – Present
JMart LLP Almaty, Kazakhstan
•Developed a REST API using Spring Boot, MySQL to store data and RabbitMQ to communicate between
microservices
•Documented API endpoints using Swagger, facilitating easier integration and maintenance for developers
•Refactored code, fixed bugs to improve overall code quality and readability
•Created integration tests by using JUnit, Testcontainers, Wiremock, Spring Cloud Contract and Mockito
•Designed API tests with JUnit, REST-assured, Assert that cover all company’s services
•Analyzed API tests’ coverage of services by using Swagger-coverage, and demonstrated results by Grafana and
Allure report
•Informed QA engineers about errors in tests via telegram notifications by integrating Telegram API and bot
Projects
toqyzkumalak |Python, Telegram API April 2021 – April 2021
•Developed program to play game called toqyzkumalak in python
•Created several bots to play against players with different levels of difficulties
•Designed telegram bot so users can play it anywhere
Minesweeper |C++ April 2021 – April 2021
•Created minesweeper playable in cli
SOLIDBankApp |Spring boot, Java, Maven Git, H2 database May 2022 – May 2022
•Developed a project for the bank’s backend using SOLID principles
Technical Skills
Languages : Java, C/C++, Python, SQL (Postgres, MySQL)
Frameworks : JUnit, Spring, Hibernate
Developer Tools : Git, Docker, RabbitMQ, Lombok, Swagger, Lens, Postman, DBeaver, Grafana, Swagger
Libraries : Maven, Swagger-coverage, Testcontainers, REST-assured Problem solving : have more than 450 solved
problems on Leetcode , had at max 1594 rating on Codeforces
Achievements
ICPC Participated in 3 Northern Eurasia Finals. Ranked 7th out of 65 teams in Kazakhstan’s regional ICPC contest.
Meta Hacker Cup Participated in 2 round and ranked 1126th out of 5000 participants.
KBTU Open Ranked 16 in the competitive team programming contest.
Yandex Cup Participated in the final part of the international Yandex Cup contest.
Other Achieved 3 place in Astana IT University’s contest for best programmers.

resume.title: Summary
resume.description:
Summary
Frontend developer with a strong background in modernizing and optimizing web projects. Specializes in Vue.js, React and
TypeScript. Expertise in reducing build sizes, enhancing performance, and seamlessly adopting technologies like Vite.
Proven track record of driving significant improvements in both startup and enterprise environments.
Experience
Choco Holding | Almaty, Almaty
Frontend Developer | 09/2023 - Present
Accelerated project builds and improved development by migrating 3 projects from Webpack to Vite.
Built and published 6 iOS and Android apps using React Native, establishing a contract between native and WebView.
Created a JavaScript barcode scanning library (choco-barcode-scanner) available on npm.
Improved developer experience by creating a bot for Merge Request notifications. Used in 10+ microservices repositories
and 5+ frontend repositories. Emphasized on reducing time to TTM
Successfully migrated 2 projects from JavaScript to TypeScript. This made the code easier to maintain and scale
Successfully migrated 3 Vue projects to Script Setup. Observed best practices
Optimized the client application (SPA). Reduced build weight from 5.3MB to 4.16MB, improved code utilization from 45%
to 67%. Implemented asynchronous page loading. Accelerated page loading in co-op.
Additional: Worked with Lottie and Vanilla CSS animations to improve the interface, with Yandex and 2gis maps.
Vue2/3, Typescript, React Native, Vite, Webpack, Vitest, Jest, Docker, Gitlab CI, WebView
Halyk Bank | Almaty, Almaty
Frontend Developer | 06/2022 - 09/2022
During my tenure at Halyk Bank's Online Banking Department, I focused on enhancing Developer Experience through auto-
generated documentation and collaboration efforts.
Enhanced Developer Experience (DX) by implementing auto-generated documentation and crafting comprehensive
installation instructions, fostering smooth collaboration across teams.
Contributed to UI-library enhancements, ensuring consistency and an enhanced user experience.
Spearheaded technical optimizations including codebase refinement and universal functionality
implementation.
Angular, TypeScript, RxJS, Storybook
Choco Holding | Almaty, Almaty
Frontend Developer | 02/2022 - 05/2022
Actively contributed to the development and enhancement of the user interface and merchant interface.
Conducting redesign and refactoring of the menu, improving the user experience and streamlining the application
workflow.
Fixing errors and bugs in RahmetBiz functionality related to our service, including editing categories and products, as well
as ensuring the proper functioning of automatic online order disabling.
Assisting in the integration with IIKO, enhancing the interaction process between systems.
Participating in the redesign process of the homepage and map, including the navigation panel, markers, and header.
Vue2/3, Webpack, Vue test utils, Jest, Docker
DAR | Almaty, Almaty
Frontend Developer Internship | 08/2021 - 11/2021
First Frontend Development Summer Internship - DAR Summer Internship
React, TypeScript, Redux, Redux-saga, SCSS
Morrison Code | Almaty, Almaty
Support Mentor | 03/2021 - 06/2021Asatulla Dadabaev
+77079986392 | debixxter@gmail.com | Almaty, AlmatyProvided mentorship for the "Web Development" course, covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and React.js.
Assisted students with code-related queries and corrections, tracked progress, and delivered weekly supplementary
lectures.
Reviewed and provided feedback on assignments to reinforce understanding.
Skills
JavaScript, Typescript, Python, HTML/CSS, Vue, Nuxt, React, React Native, Astro, Node.js, Vite, Webpack, Vitest, Jest,
Vue Test Utils, CI/CD/, Docker
Education
Almaty Management University | Almaty, Almaty
Bachelor of Software Engineering, Computer Science | 07/2023
Award:

KazEnergy StudentDigitalFest-2022 Winner
ALMAU Startup Night 2019 Winner(Go Pau Team)
